oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A serological comparison of some animal herpesviruses
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martin, W. B.
Castrucci, G.
Frigeri, F.
Ferrari, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bovine herpesvirus 1
neutralization tests
bovine herpesvirus 4
red deer
goats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bovine herpesvirus 1 (BHV-1) isolates (Cooper-type strain 4975 and Oxford) were compared in neutralization tests with bovine herpesvirus 4 (BHV-4) isolate (85/16TV) and the herpesviruses of red deer (D2839/1) and goats (E/CH). Full article published in Comp. Immun. Microbial. Infec. Dis., (1990) 13, 75-84
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1994; 96
